name: Alakazam E4 LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Damage Switch
poke_power.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon SP to another of your Pokémon SP. This power can’t be used if Alakazam E4 is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Alakazam E4. Alakazam E4 LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
